original_text: The God of Israel has caused you Levites to be separate from all the other Israelites. He has brought you near to himself, to work in the Lord's Tent. He has chosen you to stand in front of all the people to serve them. But it seems that this is not enough for you.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님이 이스라엘 회중에서 너희를 구별하여 자기에게 가까이 하게 하사 여호와의 성막에서 봉사하게 하시며 회중 앞에 서서 그들을 대신하여 섬기게 하심이 너희에게 작은 일이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The God of Israel has caused you Levites to be separate
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 하나님께서 너희 레위 사람들을 구별하게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: He has brought you near to himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희를 자기에게 가까이 오게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: to work in the Lord's Tent
He has chosen you to stand in front of all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희를 모든 백성 앞에 서도록 선택하셨다

sentences.original_text: But it seems that this is not enough for you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이것이 너희에게 충분하지 않은 것 같다
